definitions.title: vb. penetrate
definitions.body: , cut (NH id., cut, cut out, Aram. [[גְּדַד]], gad, Ar. jad= cut, cut off; Eth. gadd: in deriv.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. Ps 94:21 [[יׇג֠וֹדּוּ עַל־נֶפֶשׁ]] [[חַדִּיִק]] they attack (penetrate, make inroads upon) the life of a righteous man (Ol prop. [[יׇגוּרוּ]] cf. Ps 56:7, Ps 59:4 where, however, Che [[יגודו]]; si vera l., perh. denom. fr. [[גְּדוּד]] cf. Ho 6:9 & infr.; cf. also [[גוד]] & Kö:i. 356).

cut oneself, as religious (heathen) practice 1Ki 18:28; practised also by men of Schechem, etc. in worship of ´[[י]] (late) Je 41:5; for the dead, forbidden De 14:1 [[לאׁ תִתְגּׂדְדוּ]] [[וְלאׂ תָשִׂימוּ קָרְחָה בֵּין עֵינֵיכֶם לָמֵת]], Je 16:6; cf. Je 47:5 (subject Philistia personified); also for MT [[יִתְגּוֹרָâרוּ]] Ho 7:14 Codd, they cut themselves, LXX Gr Che RVm, or perh. (cf. [[גּוּר]]) sub.

gather in troops, or bands; go in troops or throngs, throng; (denominative fr. [[גְּדוּד]] q.v.) cf. [[תִּתְגּׁדֲדִי]] Mic 4:14 (addressed to Jerusalem); Je 5:7 ´[[וּבֵית זוֹנׇה יִתְגּ]] and to a harlot's house they throng.
